alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 2:32PM CDT until June 02 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR CIMARRON...DALLAM AND NORTHEASTERN HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 232 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles northwest of Conlen, or 18 miles north of Dalhart, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Boise City, Keyes, Kenton, Wheeless, Ware, Black Mesa Park, Felt, Conlen, Griggs and Sturgis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
